tool_description: Validates that reference standards and calibration equipment are within their calibration validity period and meet accuracy requirements for the intended measurements.

reference_id.description: Unique identifier of the reference standard

calibration_date.description: Last calibration date of reference standard

required_accuracy.description: Required measurement accuracy as uncertainty ratio

error_messages: Reference standard expired: Calibration certificate has expired. Recalibrate reference standard before use.
Insufficient accuracy: Reference standard accuracy does not meet requirements for intended measurements.
Invalid calibration date: Provided date format is incorrect or date is in the future.
Missing calibration certificate: Cannot validate reference standard without valid calibration documentation.
Accuracy ratio invalid: Required accuracy must be a positive number representing uncertainty ratio.
usage: Provide reference standard ID, last calibration date, validity period, and required accuracy. Tool validates current status and fitness for use in calibration procedures.

validation_status.description: Overall validation result for the reference standard

days_until_expiry.description: Number of days until calibration expires

accuracy_compliant.description: Whether reference meets required accuracy specifications

next_calibration_due.description: Date when next calibration is due
